titleStmt.title: Long lasting newes: or Newes for newters Or, The check cause cure of halting. With 31 doores of hope for the good successe of the then publick cause of the nation. Delivered in a sermon, November 27. 1644 in the Colledge of Glocester, before that valiant and vigilant governour Colonell Massy, being the day of publick humiliation. By Walter Powell, M.A. vicar of Standish.
Newes for newters.
titleStmt.author: Powell, Walter, b. 1590 or 91.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M[atthew] Simmons, in Aldersgate-street,

notesStmt.note: First published in 1648 with title: Newes for newters.
The words "check cause cure" are bracketed together on title page.
Considerable print show-through with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
